docs.summary: API to sell tickets

permissions.name: Manage Ticket Definitions
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and change event ticket definitions.

docs.summary: Changes the currency for all tickets (per event).

permissions.name: Manage Ticket Definitions
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and change event ticket definitions.

docs.summary: Changes the currency for all tickets (per event).

permissions.name: Manage Ticket Definitions
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and change event ticket definitions.

docs.summary: Creates a ticket definition (and enables ticket sales).

examples.title: Create paid ticket definition
response:
{"definition": {
  "id": "fa3b78b5-4a30-4c67-9b2e-32a3b6b3ca94",
  "price":   {
    "amount": "100.00",
    "currency": "USD",
    "value": "100.00"
  },
  "free": false,
  "name": "VIP ticket",
  "description": "Includes drinks",
  "limitPerCheckout": 10,
  "orderIndex": 3,
  "policy": "This is your event ticket. Ticket holders must present their tickets on entry. You can either print your ticket or present this digital version. You can find all the details about this event on our website. If you have any questions, issues or wish to get a refund, contact the event host. If you can’t attend the event, please get in touch. Looking forward to seeing you there!",
  "dashboard":   {
    "hidden": false,
    "sold": 0,
    "limited": true,
    "quantity": 10,
    "unsold": 10
  },
  "eventId": "fd56076c-38f4-4705-b9eb-ec322b85c745",
  "wixFeeConfig": {"type": "FEE_INCLUDED"},
  "saleStatus": "SALE_STARTED"
}}

permissions.name: Manage Ticket Definitions
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and change event ticket definitions.

members.name: currency
members.doc: ISO 4217 format of the currency i.e. `USD`.

members.name: value
members.doc: Monetary amount. Decimal string with a period as a decimal separator (e.g., 3.99). Optionally, a single (-), to indicate that the amount is negative.

docs.summary: Set of key-value pairs. Facet counts aggregated per value

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type integer

members.name: counts
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs. Facet counts aggregated per value

members.name: count
members.doc: Number of items in the response.

members.name: instanceId
members.doc: Instance ID. Indicates the original app instance which current entity originated from.

members.name: eventId
members.doc: Event ID. Indicates the original event which current entity originated from.

members.name: entityId
members.doc: Event ID. Indicates the original entity which current entity originated from.

members.name: hideNotOnSale
members.doc: Whether to hide this ticket if it's not on sale

members.name: fixedPrice
members.doc: Ticket price which is read only.

members.name: hidden
members.doc: Whether ticket is hidden and cannot be sold.

members.name: sold
members.doc: Number of tickets sold and reserved.

members.name: limited
members.doc: Whether the ticket has limited quantity.

members.name: quantity
members.doc: Ticket limit. `NULL` for unlimited ticket definitions.

members.name: unsold
members.doc: Number of unsold tickets. `NULL` for unlimited ticket definitions.

members.name: free
members.doc: Whether the ticket is free (read only).

members.name: limitPerCheckout
members.doc:
Limit of tickets that can be purchased per checkout.
 Set to 20 for unlimited ticket definition.

members.name: policy
members.doc: Policy information plain text block, as printed on the ticket.

members.name: eventId
members.doc: Event ID associated with the ticket.

members.name: wixFeeConfig
members.doc: Configuration of the fixed-rate Wix service fee that is applied at checkout to each ticket sold.

members.name: paths
members.doc: The set of field mask paths.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Number of items to skip in the current sort order.

members.name: cursor
members.doc:
Pointer to the next or previous page in the list of results.

You can get the relevant cursor token
from the `pagingMetadata` object in the previous call's response.
Not relevant for the first request.

members.name: count
members.doc: Number of items returned in the response.

members.name: total
members.doc: Total number of items that match the query. Returned if offset paging is used and the `tooManyToCount` flag is not set.

members.name: tooManyToCount
members.doc: Flag that indicates the server failed to calculate the `total` field.

members.name: cursors
members.doc: Cursors to navigate through the result pages using `next` and `prev`. Returned if cursor paging is used.

members.name: next
members.doc: Cursor pointing to next page in the list of results.

members.name: prev
members.doc: Cursor pointing to previous page in the list of results.

members.name: fieldName
members.doc: Name of the field to sort by.

members.name: filter
sort
members.doc:
Sort object in the following format:
`[{"fieldName":"sortField1","order":"ASC"},{"fieldName":"sortField2","order":"DESC"}]`

members.name: fields
members.doc: Array of projected fields. A list of specific field names to return. If `fieldsets` are also specified, the union of `fieldsets` and `fields` is returned.

members.name: fieldsets
members.doc: Array of named, predefined sets of projected fields. A array of predefined named sets of fields to be returned. Specifying multiple `fieldsets` will return the union of fields from all sets. If `fields` are also specified, the union of `fieldsets` and `fields` is returned.

members.name: paging
members.doc: Paging options to limit and skip the number of items.

members.name: cursorPaging
members.doc: Cursor token pointing to a page of results. Not used in the first request. Following requests use the cursor token and not `filter` or `sort`.

members.name: fieldset
members.doc: Set of fields to return in the response. See [fieldsets](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-events/wix-events/fieldset#wix-events_wix-events_fieldset_ticket-definition-fieldset).

members.name: facet
members.doc:
Filter facets to include in the response.
 See [supported facets](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-events/wix-events/filter-and-sort#wix-events_wix-events_filter-and-sort_query-ticket-definitions).

docs.summary: Set of key-value pairs. Filter facets.

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type object

members.name: total
members.doc: Total ticket definitions matching the given filters.

members.name: facets
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs. Filter facets.

messages.name: _wix_events_ticketing_QueryTicketDefinitionsRequestV2
messages.displayName: Query Ticket Definitions Request V 2 Object

messages.name: _wix_events_ticketing_QueryTicketDefinitionsResponseV2
messages.displayName: Query Ticket Definitions Response V 2 Object

members.name: fieldset
members.doc: Set of fields to return in the response. See [Fieldsets](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-events/wix-events/fieldset#wix-events_wix-events_fieldset_ticket-definition-fieldset)

members.name: eventCreatorId
members.doc: Event creator id filter, by default any.

members.name: facet
members.doc:
Filter facets to include in the response.
 See [supported facets](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-events/wix-events/filter-and-sort#wix-events_wix-events_filter-and-sort_list-ticket-definitions).

docs.summary: Set of key-value pairs. Filter facets.

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type object

members.name: facets
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs. Filter facets.

members.name: limited
members.doc: Whether this ticket type is limited in quantity.

members.name: quantity
members.doc:
Limit for this ticket type.  

`NULL` for unlimited.

members.name: orderIndex
members.doc: Custom sort index for manual tickets ordering implementation.

members.name: policy
members.doc: Policy information in plain text (as listed on the ticket).

members.name: hidden
members.doc: Whether this ticket type is hidden to customers and cannot be purchased.

members.name: wixFeeConfig
members.doc:
Configuration of the fixed-rate Wix service fee that is applied to each ticket sold.  

Default: `FEE_ADDED_AT_CHECKOUT`.

members.name: fieldset
members.doc: Set of fields to return in the response. See [Fieldsets](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-events/wix-events/fieldset#wix-events_wix-events_fieldset_ticket-definition-fieldset)

members.name: fields
members.doc: Set of field paths, specifying which parts of ticket definition to update.

members.name: all
members.doc: Whether to delete all event tickets.

members.name: timestamp
members.doc: Ticket Definition created timestamp in ISO UTC format.

members.name: timestamp
members.doc: Ticket definition deleted timestamp in ISO UTC format.

members.name: timestamp
members.doc: Ticket definition updated timestamp in ISO UTC format.

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • FEE_ADDED - Fee is added to the ticket price at checkout
  • FEE_INCLUDED - Seller absorbs the fee. It is deducted from the ticket price
  • FEE_ADDED_AT_CHECKOUT - Fee is added to the ticket price at checkout

Possible values are:
  • SALE_SCHEDULED - Ticket sale is scheduled to start
  • SALE_STARTED - Ticket sale has started
  • SALE_ENDED - Ticket sale has ended

Possible values are:
  • STANDARD
  • DONATION

Possible values are:
  • INCLUDE_HIDDEN_NOT_ON_SALE

Possible values are:
  • ASC
  • DESC

Possible values are:
  • POLICY - Include policy in the response.
  • DASHBOARD - Include dashboard in the response.

Possible values are:
  • VISIBLE - Ticket is available for purchase.
  • HIDDEN - Opposite to VISIBLE.
  • FREE - Ticket price is 0.
  • PAID - Ticket price is greater than 0.
